attributes.action: SHOW HIS DRIVE AND STEADFASTNESS IN THE FACE OF THIS UTTER GARBAGE ABOUT HIS ALLEGED "BULLYING"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is vital in the run up to the general election that Gordon demonstrates to the prospective voter that he has nothing to hide about the alleged Bullying as such I would ask all fair minded people to support this petition

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. As it stands this petition does not make any point about government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
